title: Zelensky annuncia nuove decisioni a sostegno dell'Ucraina
cleaned_sentences: The Ukrainian president thanks European leaders for the support and hopes for a ceasefire with Russia "We are preparing good decisions in support of Ukraine and her people".
This was stated in his usual evening video video message, the Ukrainian president, Volodymyr Zelensky, writes Ukrinform.
"Today I spoke to the French president Emmanuel Macron.
I also spoke to the Finn President Stubb - Alexander, thank you!

"I also want to thank all the leaders - the British Prime Minister Starmer, the German Chancellor Merz and the Polish Prime Minister Tusk - who yesterday were in Kiev together with Emmanuel, as well as all those who joined us online.
We had a very productive meeting.
I am also grateful to all the leaders and the countries with which we spoke of security, diplomacy and ceased the fire - 30 countries, continued.
Zelensky has hoped that Russia mitigates the fire, so it will personally await the leader of the Kremlin Vladimir Putin in TÃ¼rkiye on May 15th.
